00036 class SoSceneTexture2P;
00037 
00038 class COIN_DLL_API SoSceneTexture2 : public SoNode {
00039   typedef SoNode inherited;
00040 
00041   SO_NODE_HEADER(SoSceneTexture2);
00042

00044   static void initClass(void);
00045   SoSceneTexture2(void);
00046 
00047   enum Model {
00048     MODULATE = SoTextureImageElement::MODULATE,
00049     DECAL = SoTextureImageElement::DECAL,
00050     BLEND = SoTextureImageElement::BLEND,
00051     REPLACE = SoTextureImageElement::REPLACE
00052   };
00053 
00054   enum Wrap {
00055     REPEAT = SoTextureImageElement::REPEAT,
00056     CLAMP = SoTextureImageElement::CLAMP
00057   };
00058 
00059   enum TransparencyFunction {
00060     NONE,
00061     ALPHA_BLEND,
00062     ALPHA_TEST
00063   };
00064 
00065   SoSFEnum wrapS;
00066   SoSFEnum wrapT;
00067   SoSFEnum model;
00068   SoSFColor blendColor;
00069 
00070   SoSFVec4f backgroundColor;
00071   SoSFVec2s size;
00072   SoSFNode scene;
00073   SoSFEnum transparencyFunction;
00074 
00075   virtual void notify(SoNotList * list);
00076   virtual void write(SoWriteAction * action);
00077 
00078   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00079   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00080   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00081   virtual void rayPick(SoRayPickAction * action);
00082 
00083 protected:
00084   virtual ~SoSceneTexture2(void);
00085 
00086 private:
00087   SoSceneTexture2P * pimpl;
00088 };
